metadata.name: Keeper's Rope
metadata.description:
Transform yourself into a hanger with Keeper's Rope, a cut item from Repentance!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/zx4jgfI.png[/img]
[b][h1]------------------------ 𝐊𝐞𝐞𝐩𝐞𝐫'𝐬 𝐑𝐨𝐩𝐞 ------------------------[/h1][/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/zzbODRH.png[/img] [i]Beat the money out of them[/i] [list] [*][u][b]Item Pools[/b][/u] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/TH2DClE.png[/img] Secret [img]https://i.imgur.com/TH2DClE.png[/img] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/rSHsQJi.png[/img] Greed Secret [img]https://i.imgur.com/rSHsQJi.png[/img] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/n3Q3HoU.png[/img] Greed Shop [img]https://i.imgur.com/n3Q3HoU.png[/img] [/list] [/list] [list] [*][u][b]Effects[/b][/u] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/pUXwW4e.png[/img] Grants [b]Flight[/b] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/pOqP6nJ.png[/img] Upon spawning, monsters have a [b]14%-25%[/b] chance to contain [b]1-3 pennies[/b] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/79fdwIR.png[/img] Keeper = [b]9%-17%[/b] chance to contain [b]1-2 pennies[/b] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/kf56tNn.png[/img] Tainted Keeper = [b]7%-13%[/b] chance to contain [b]1 penny[/b] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/5m1tWQd.png[/img] [b]Damage the monsters[/b] to extract the pennies! [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/5iQSa3y.png[/img] The [b]pennies disappear[/b] after 3 seconds [/list] [/list] [/list] [/list] [list] [*][u][b]Synergies[/b][/u] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/AMn6jJ5.png[/img]Mr. Boom = Bombs have a [b]33% chance[/b] to drop alongside pennies [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/qPQ9y1x.png[/img]Dad's Key = Keys have a [b]33% chance[/b] to drop alongside pennies [/list] [/list]
[b][h1]----------------------- 𝐌𝐨𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 ----------------------[/h1][/b][list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]External Item Descriptions[/url] (English [img]https://i.imgur.com/11ORCm6.png[/img] Español [img]https://i.imgur.com/BCCFhHE.png[/img] Pусский [img]https://i.imgur.com/vFcOh4w.png[/img]) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2376005362]Encyclopedia[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2726016551]Minimap Items[/url] [/list] [img]https://i.imgur.com/9Lz5VfQ.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫, 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198858875349]Akad[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/anchikai]anchikai.[/url] [*][u]𝐀𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199054232018]ALADAR[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/gonxolito]Goncholito[/url] [*][u]𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url] [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u]= [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [/list]
